attributes.action: Stop killing all the dogs just because of their looks
attributes.background: A puppy was killed just becuase it looked like a dangeruos dog.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about dangerous dogs law, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. You'll need to give your full name to start a new petition.

You might also like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/223784
